Structs/Statistics.html#/s:11KituraCache.name: hits
Structs/Statistics.html#/s:11KituraCache.abstract: The total number of times an access attempt successfully retrieved an entry from the cache.

Structs/Statistics.html#/s:11KituraCache.name: misses
Structs/Statistics.html#/s:11KituraCache.abstract: The total number of times an access attempt was unable to retrieve an entry in the cache.

Structs/Statistics.html#/s:11KituraCache.name: numberOfKeys
Structs/Statistics.html#/s:11KituraCache.abstract: The total number of entries curently in the cache.

Classes/KituraCache.html#/s:11KituraCach.name: setObject(_:forKey:withTTL:)
Classes/KituraCache.html#/s:11KituraCach.abstract: Adds a new entry or updates the existing entry if the key is already associated with an object in the cache. The lifespan of the entry (in seconds) in the cache can be set using the optional withTTL parameter.

Classes/KituraCache.html#/s:11KituraCach.name: object(forKey:)
Classes/KituraCache.html#/s:11KituraCach.abstract: Retrieve an object from the cache for a specified key.

Classes/KituraCache.html#/s:11KituraCach.name: keys()
Classes/KituraCache.html#/s:11KituraCach.abstract: Retrieve all of the keys present in the cache.

Classes/KituraCache.html#/s:11KituraCach.name: removeObject(forKey:)
Classes/KituraCache.html#/s:11KituraCach.abstract: Remove an object from the cache for a specified key.

Classes/KituraCache.html#/s:11KituraCach.name: removeObjects(forKeys:)
Classes/KituraCache.html#/s:11KituraCach.abstract: Remove objects from the cache for multiple, specified keys.

Classes/KituraCache.html#/s:11KituraCach.name: removeObjects(forKeys:)
Classes/KituraCache.html#/s:11KituraCach.abstract: Remove objects from the cache for multiple, specified keys provided in an array.

Classes/KituraCache.html#/s:11KituraCach.name: setTTL(_:forKey:)
Classes/KituraCache.html#/s:11KituraCach.abstract: Set the Time to Live value (in seconds) for a cache entry.

Classes/KituraCache.html#/s:11KituraCach.name: flush()
Classes/KituraCache.html#/s:11KituraCach.abstract: Remove all cache entries and reset the cache statistics.

Classes/KituraCache.html.name: KituraCache
Classes/KituraCache.html.abstract: A thread-safe, in-memory cache for storing an object against a Hashable key.
